programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. Da Pers Family ep 3
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 8
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 23
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 10
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 3
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 13
programme.desc: After Stephen, the school's casanova, breaks the heart of Naomi's bestfriend, Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 6
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Ang TV The Movie (The Adarna Adventure)
Won't Last A Day Without You
Ang Mga Kaibigan ni Mama Susan
Haba Baba Doo Puti Puti Poo
Hindi Ako Ander, Tanong Mo Kay Kumander
Joe Reyes: Mahirap Patayin, Masamang Buhayin
SA KUKO NG AGILA ERAP ESTRADA
ROCKABYE BABY , TATLO ANG DADDY KO GARY VALENCIANO
Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: Buy One, Take One
programme.desc: Salve (Sharon) and Sion (Susan) are sisters living with their grandparents. One day, Salve's friend invites her to apply for abroad only to be tricked because it was an illegal recruitment agency selling women for foreigners.

programme.title: Juan Tamad Jr.
programme.desc: Child wonder Niño Muhlach plays the precocious Juan whose lovable antics as a lazy boy translates into a rip-roaring comedy feature film. But Juan's carefree lifestyle halts when he is kidnapped by a child labor gang. What will happen if Juan is able to use his laziness to be able to escape?

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Beloved (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Friendship took a violent turn when Nora Aunor found herself a pawn in the intriguing games, being played by her close friend and employer, Hilda Koronel. How far would the bounds of friendship go?

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Brando Bandido
programme.desc: Would it be really a surprise if the enigmatic avenger \"Brando Bandido\" (Andy Poe) is actually Zardo's son, all grown-up and ready to get back at his father's killers?

programme.title: Isa Lang Ang Dapat Mahalin
programme.desc: Vina Torres is a successful young lawyer with a happy family life. But things start to falter when her car hits Rex,ca criminal wanting to change for the better together with his dancer-girlfriend.

programme.title: Hindi Ako Ander (Itanong Mo Kay Kumander)
programme.desc: Real-life husband and wife, Janno Gibbs and Bing Loyzaga, took their talented daughter, Allyssa, through her paces in her first film appearance. Janno was jobless husband forced to keep house.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Joe Reyes...Mahirap Patayin, Masamang Buhayin
programme.desc: Action star Roi Vinzon plays honest cop Joe Reyes. On a surveillance mission, he is able to record government Undersecretary Ruiz offering protection to foreigners regarding their illegal activities in exchange for money on video.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Topo-Topo Barega
programme.desc: \"Topo Topo Barega\", an expression meaning \"All for one, One for all.\" What each earns individually becomes the money of all. The problem of one worries the rest.

programme.title: Anino sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger ng Dose Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Boy Recto
programme.desc: When a busy street - Claro M. Recto becomes living hell for students and young people, Boy Recto (Ronnie Ricketts) undertake a dangerous rescue mission to save the youngstersfrom attack by various gangsters.

programme.title: M\u0026M, The Incredible Twins
programme.desc: An unfortunate accident separates twins Marcelo (Jimmy Santos) and Marcelino (Herbert Bautista) at birth. Marcelo is adopted by a poor family while Marcelino grows up with their biological parents.
